entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Gull Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:39 AM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -8.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Armstrong Airport 1:48 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -8.0°C
Pressure: 100.5 kPa
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 100 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -8.0°C
Wind: N 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries mixed with ice pellets. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries or ice pellets early this afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 5. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and overnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then cloudy. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 29 December 2022
